data.title: Flushing truck Kalmar
data.meta_description: Flushing truck on site! We help you with sewer blockages and all other needs. Fast and reliable, call us!
data.text:
Effortlessly to the spot

One call is enough. Flushing truck Kalmar always at your side. With us, you will always get a local flushing truck.

Flushing services 24/7

Do you have a sewer blockage or is the restaurant floor drain full? Our on-call flush truck drivers are ready to help you with all your needs, from sewer blockages, pipe jetting to pump servicing.

Flushing of drains

Emptying

Flushing truck works

Flushing truck day

Emptying of wells

Filming of pipes

High pressure flushing

Flushing of pipes

Steam services

Inspections

Estate cars

Pumping stations

Pumping stations

Maintenance

Flooding in the basement?

In case of water damage, immediately turn off the water at the main water meter if possible. This way we can minimize the damage. In case of environmental damage, time must never be wasted and quickly finding a flushing truck is essential. By reacting to the problem immediately and calling our emergency service, you will save time and effort. Also, keep in mind that you can often get a red deduction for the work.

Play Video

Flushing truck on site in Kalmar 24/7

When you need a breakdown truck in the Kalmar area, contact 24 Center directly on 020 74 24 70. We work on an emergency center principle and respond immediately to all your needs. We prevent the damage from escalating by providing telephone advice and send a skilled cleaner to the site in the best case already within 15 minutes. The job is carried out by a cleaner in the Kalmar area who handles the work from start to finish on your terms. The local cleaner knows the residential area of Kalmar and, in the best case, also its building stock, quickly finds the target and does the necessary work in no time.

We are with you from start to finish

Contact and order

Invoicing and feedback

Missions carried out

Flushing truck in Löddeköpinge

At the beginning of August, 24 Center's customer service received a call from a man from Löddeköpinge. He had a blockage in the sewer at his home and needed a flushing truck on site to clear the blockage. After a few hours, the flushing truck was on site and the technician started work. The technician did not get the drains completely open on the first visit, but they agreed to film the drain so that they get the blockage completely open.

Stop in toilet

At the end of August, a lady from Malmö noticed that her toilet was not working properly. She had a problem with the toilet drain, when she flushed the toilet the waste water came up from the shower floor drain. It didn't take long for the technician to call and within an hour the flush truck was on site, ready to tackle the problem. The flush went flawlessly and the lady was able to go to the bathroom again, without having to worry about a lot of sewage coming up from the shower drain.

Contact us!

We will contact you as soon as possible.

Flushing truck Kalmar 24/7

Do you have a sewer blockage or is the restaurant floor drain full? Our on-call flush truck technicians are ready to help you with all your needs. We handle sewer filming, sewer flushing, pump maintenance and more. Contact 24 Center. One number, all building services.

Arby, Boholmarna, Bottorp, Böle, Drag, Dunö, Ekenäs, Förlösa, Hagby, Halltorp, Harby, Hossmo, Igelösa, Jutnabben, Kolboda, Krafslösa, Kulltorp, Kåremo, Källtorpsmo, Lindsdal, Ljungbyholm, Loverslund, Läckeby, Mortorp, Nickebo, Olsbo, Påryd, Revsudden, Rinkaby, Rinkabyholm, Rockneby, Runtorp, Råby, Sandvik, Skällby, Smedby, Söregärde, Tingby, Trekanten, Tvärskog, Törnebyslätt, Vassmolösa, Voxtorp, Åmunnen, Äspelund, Ölvingstorp

Frequently asked questions about 24 Center

24 Center is a call center for building technology. We offer help with real estate technology problems. You can get all the help you need regarding building maintenance services, both urgent and non-urgent, with just one phone call.

24 Center Sweden's head office is located at Forsbyvägen 6, Knivsta. From the head office, our customer service serves all of Sweden regarding real estate technical problems.

24 Center makes sure that the customer gets in touch with the right supplier who can be on site at the right time. We believe that getting help when you need it should be hassle-free and fast!

Most repair, maintenance and installation work in a home or condominium, you must own and live in the home during the period that the work is performed to get the rotavdrag deduction. 24 Center helps to apply for rotavdrag deduction and customer service helps you with questions regarding rotavdrag deduction.

Up to 30% of the cost of the work. We can help you apply for the rotavdrag deduction if you are eligible for the rotavdrag deduction.

Typical losses covered by home insurance are water damage caused by broken pipes or equipment connected to them, and fire, smoke and soot damage. The amount of compensation for water damage is affected by the age of the broken device or pipe.

Call anyway. 24 Centers customer service wants to help customers in all emergencies. The call is free of charge and many things can be solved at home with the help of tips based on the experience of the customer service.

24 Center also services less urgent orders. Jobs ordered at least three working days in advance also have a cheaper hourly rate. You can place the order yourself as an online order on our website at 24center.se/online-ordering

Key tips for spray truck work

If there is a blockage in more than one place, it is a sign that the blockage is deeper in the pipes and then we recommend ordering a flushing truck.

Prices incl. red deduction can be found here:

Work (Flushing truck, Weekdays 07-15): 1323 kr / h (min. 2 h)

Work (Flushing truck, Time other than weekdays 07-15): 2023 kr / h (min. 2.5 h)

Work (Steam car, Weekdays 07-15): 2233 kr / h (min. 3 h)

Work (Steam car, Other time than weekdays 07-15): 2443 kr / h (min. 3 h)

Work (High power flushing truck, Weekdays 07-15): 2023 kr / h (min. 2 h)

Work (High power flush truck, Other time than weekdays 07-15): 2723 kr / h (min. 2.5 h)

All 24 Center service prices can be found at Prices of services

When there are recurring problems with the drain, you can film the drain to see if it is in good condition. For example, if the drains are not draining well, the drains are bubbling or water is rising in the sink.
